Housing Lead Signal

Housing lead indicator: permits, starts momentum, and mortgage headwinds.

As of Unknown

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The housing market regime is currently Neutral as of 2025-08-31.
  • The Housing Lead indicator stands at -0.207119, suggesting mild weakness in the sector.
  • Housing starts recovered from a -1.37 z-score in May 2025 to 0.16 z-score by August 2025.
  • Housing permits have declined from 1481 in March 2025 to 1330 in August 2025.

Technical Summary:

  • The z-score for housing permits (Z_PERMIT) is -0.604614, indicating below-median activity.
  • Housing starts (Z_HOUST) are near their median at 0.160205, reflecting a significant rebound.
  • The 30-year mortgage rate (Z_MORT) is close to its median at 0.044428.
  • Extreme z-scores were observed for housing starts in February 2025 (+2.17) and May 2025 (-1.37).

References:

  • Housing market data, latest 2025-12-31, most complete 2025-08-31. Influential datapoints: Housing_Lead and Z_HOUST volatility.
  • [Source: housing_lead] for the Housing Lead signal.
  • Public dataset: FRED Housing Starts (HOUST) would improve future analysis.
  • Public dataset: FRED 30-Year Fixed Rate Mortgage Average (MORTGAGE30US) for rate context.

Self-Healing

  • High-Value Inputs to Add:
    • Housing Starts and Permits methodology: Clarify calculation for `Housing_Lead` and `Housing_Regime`.
    • Capex Intent data series: Provide actual `Capex_Intent` and `Capex_Regime` data for direct analysis.
  • Weaknesses in Provided Inputs:
    • The `PERMIT` column in the data table should be explicitly defined as housing permits.
    • The methodology for `Housing_Lead` and `Housing_Regime` is missing; provide a corresponding document.
  • Prompt Gaps or Issues:
    • Clarify if the provided "Capex Intent Methodology" is for general interpretive principles or for a missing `Capex_Intent` data column.

Max 6 bullets across all sections. Be precise, directive, and avoid filler.
